about_the_game:
The official soundtrack to Seinarukana.

Soundtrack files will be downloaded inside your Seinarukana game folder.

Tracks:
01 Seinarukana
02 Orichalcum Name
03 The Bravery
04 Fight it out
05 Cross Sword
06 Last Battalion
07 Eternal Warrior
08 Glorious Brilliance
09 Raise our Mind
10 Inevitable Confliction
11 Gathering Heart
12 The Lamentations
13 Face down Critical Phase
14 God of Demiurge
15 Liberation and Evolution
16 Twilight Song
17 Ultimate Sin
18 Voice of Triumph
19 Sanctus
20 Haze in Maze
21 Holiday
22 Let's be Easygoing
23 Malicious Activities
24 Tense on Border
25 The Fellowship
26 Take hands, each other
27 The Lovers
28 Majesty of Absolute
29 The Euphoria
30 The Primordial One
31 Wind from Continual Sky
32 Ordinary Days
33 You and Me
34 My Only Word
35 Macrocosm
36 School Life
37 The Anxiety
